parameter.name: longDelay
parameter.label: Long press delay
parameter.description: The time in ms the button has to be held to recognize a long press.

parameter.name: shortDelay
parameter.label: Short press delay
parameter.description: The time that may pass between two consecutive short clicks to be recognized as a multi press.
